item.title: 美国联邦储备委员会主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）表示，"如果经济发展大致符合预期，"今年晚些时候 "可能会适当 "降息，但他警告说，"不能保证在降低通胀方面继续取得进展：
item.description:
US Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said that rate reductions will ‘likely be appropriate’ later this year ‘if the economy evolves broadly as expected,’ but warned that continued progress on lowering inflation ‘is not assured.’
More here: https://t.co/TnspmlKw3B pic.twitter.com/3T2Uv0AuQF

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 中国在线零售商的季度收入超过预期，达到 425.2 亿美元，略高于分析师的预测。大幅降价有助于恢复消费者对不确定经济的需求
item.description:
Chinese online retailer https://t.co/LOi8NHnjTY beat quarterly revenue estimates as it reported a revenue of $42.52 billion — just ahead of analyst projections. Aggressive price cuts helped revive demand from consumers dealing with an uncertain economy https://t.co/VFbDzWwWbG pic.twitter.com/ACC118qhLi

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 观察：中国在线零售商公布第四季度营收高于预期，并宣布将扩大股票回购计划规模，股价在美股盘前交易中大涨 12
item.description:
WATCH: https://t.co/LOi8NHnjTY shares jumped 12% in US premarket trading after the Chinese online retailer reported fourth-quarter revenue above estimates and announced it would increase the size of its share repurchase program https://t.co/VFbDzWwWbG pic.twitter.com/Gyk4lhB2H3

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 观看：DHL表示，全球贸易反弹的迹象尚不明显。这家德国快递巨头预计今年的税前盈利将达到 72 亿美元，高于疫情前的水平，但最多与分析师的预期持平。
item.description:
WATCH: DHL says there’s little sign, yet, of a global trade rebound. The German delivery giant expects pre-tax earnings of up to $7.2 billion for this year, above pre-pandemic levels but at best matching analyst estimates https://t.co/rzfbAhh2VO pic.twitter.com/MzdlTMPBkr

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024

item.title: 观看：ChatGPT制造商OpenAI驳斥了埃隆-马斯克的说法，即这家初创公司放弃了开发人工智能的初衷，即造福人类而非牟利。
item.description:
WATCH: ChatGPT maker OpenAI refuted Elon Musk's claims that the startup abandoned its original mission to develop artificial intelligence for the benefit of humanity and not for profit https://t.co/twJNumlHEu pic.twitter.com/u6m5HNbZzV

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 6, 2024
